description: "Hidden" person three person game Markov: MA=MB={{0.1},{1,1}}: Fibonacci: game value =1 MC={{-2, -2, 0}, {1, 0, 1}, {0, 1, 1}}: game value=-2 A plays with C; B plays with C; but A has no direct contact with B . A, B are the "observed" games. Characteristic polynomial: 4 + 9 x - 3 x^2 - 12 x^3 + x^4 + 4 x^5 + x^6 - x^7.
